Alexander’s article also accused Rogan of “promoting COVID-19 misinformation” and claimed his interviews with the two physicians “sparked anger.”

The case may or may not involve Atty.

Among the points Malone made to The Daily Mail editor are:
According to overwhelming data from dozens of studies and real-world use, attested to by world-leading, Nobel Prize-winning scientists and physicians, the widespread deployment of two inexpensive and extraordinarily safe medicines, hydroxychloroquine and ivermectin, in combination with other readily-accessible drugs, would have reduced U.S. COVID hospitalizations by 87.6% (https://www.ijirms.in/index.php/ijirms/article/view/1100) mortality by 74.9% (same reference).

“Among the private parties complicit in this fraudulent campaign were the manufacturers of the U.S.-authorized COVID vaccines—Moderna, Pfizer, and Johnson & Johnson—as well as Merck, Bill Gates, the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation, Glaxo Smith Kline, the Wellcome Trust, and major social media platforms, prominently including Facebook (whose CEO, Mark Zuckerberg, holds massive financial interests in for-profit vaccine companies), all of whom will potentially be named as defendants,” Malone wrote in a bullet point.

“It’s a victory, of sorts, but one that he and the rest of us may come to regret.”

Further, Malone told Loesch, “I’m in touch with various groups of lawyers that are really looking forward to the opportunity that Zuckerberg has created to take on his company, because I think he’s left himself with a huge liability.

The Rumble video Malone referenced is titled, “Terminal CWO” and subtitled, “Exposing Military Corruption.” To this writer’s knowledge, the video contains two errors in its opening moments: the date of Johnson’s hearing, which the narrator stated as “January 25, 2022,” and the claim that Renz “testified before Congress,” when in fact, Johnson was the only member of Congress conducting the hearing and those who spoke were not sworn in as during a formal hearing.

As a result, parties with vested interests in the vaccines, which have already garnered billions of dollars in federal funding and generated tens of billions of dollars in personal wealth for vaccine investors, waged a systematic, deceptive, fraudulent, yet highly effective campaign to discredit hydroxychloroquine and ivermectin as COVID treatments and to prevent them from being widely used to combat the pandemic.

In a November 1 roundtable similar to that of January 24, Johnson, one of a very few members of Congress questioning the safety and efficacy of the COVID vaccines, asked rhetorically why COVID-19 vaccine mandates should be imposed when the CDC has acknowledged that they do not prevent illness or transmission of the virus to others, vaccinated or not.

Renz has stated publicly, based on “whistleblower” reports employing government data, that the number of deaths attributed to COVID-19 vaccines far outpaces that which appears in VAERS, the Vaccine Adverse Event Reporting System used by the CDC to monitor reports of injuries, deaths and other adverse reactions to all U.S.-manufactured vaccines.

Not only are the current vaccine products “obsolete” against current variants, he said in a December 31, 2021 interview with LifeSite News, but “the vaccines, at this point in time, have amounted to record mortality and injury and should be unsafe and unfit for human use.”
Both Malone and McCullough have had the virus, they have reported.
